msg.payload ={
    "Voltage": msg.payload.voltage,
    "Instantaneous Current": msg.payload.current,
    "Instantaneous Power": msg.payload.power,
    "Frequency": msg.payload.frequency,
    "Energy Consumptions": msg.payload.energy,
    "Instantaneous Apparent": msg.payload.apparent,
    "Instantaneous Reactive": msg.payload.reactive,
    "Power Factor": msg.payload.pf,
    "Maximum Power Demand": msg.payload.mpd,
    "Maximum Current Demand": msg.payload.mcd
    }
return msg;
